mapper.select: select bno, title, nickname, credate, pin, b_group, hit from ( select bno, title, nickname, credate, pin, b_group, hit, row_number() over(order by bno desc) as rnum from board)board where rnum between #{rowStart} and #{rowEnd} order by bno desc

mapper.insert: insert into board(bno, title , nickname , credate , content , pin , b_group , hit) values((select nvl(max(bno)+1,1) from board), #{title} , #{nickname} , sysdate , #{content} , #{pin} , #{b_group} , #{hit})
